I am a young statistician (PhD) currently engaged in a post-doctoral position at [INRAE (ECOSYS)](https://ecosys.versailles-saclay.hub.inrae.fr/). I am an R enthusiast and interested in applying multiple and adapted statistical techniques to biological systems.


You can find my publications in the [research section](https://remimahmoud.github.io/rmahmoud.github.io/research.html) of this website.


Feel free to contact me for more info !
